metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14271 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Docker 19.03.x before 19.03.1 linked against the GNU C Library (aka glibc), code injection can occur when the nsswitch facility dynamically loads a library inside a chroot that contains the contents of the container.

notes.Note: ebarretto> According to upstream, it only affects v19.03.0.

criterions.comment: docker.io: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
